entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early this evening. Periods of rain beginning this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 15 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Temperature steady near 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain. High 11 with temperature falling to 7 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Amount 5 mm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 11 with temperature falling to 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers in the evening then 60 percent chance of flurries after midnight then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 31 December 2022
